title: Structures which are included in the TP Scheme area but situated outside the final plot allotted to a person and are affected by sites reserved for public purpose, provided the Planning Authority has no objection for rehabilitation of such structures
clause_text: Structures which are included in the TP Scheme area but situated outside the final plot allotted to a person and are affected by sites reserved for public purpose, provided the Planning Authority has no objection for rehabilitation of such structures.
section: 33(12).Redevelopment of contravening structures included in the Final Plot of a Town Planning (TP) Scheme and Removal and re- accommodation of tolerated structures falling in the alignment of road:
